item.description:
Come and see a very talented and impassioned man! Enzo Boscarino takes you on a whirlwind tour of Italy. From region to region you will come to appreciate your heritage as well the beautiful country of Italia. The history, funny stories and his wonderful voice will whisk you away and make you forget where you are! It's a must see!

If you are free this Monday night, November 28, come see our very talented Enzo Boscarino at CCSU in the Marcus White Building. The Marcus White is the building behind the Administration bldg. Click on this link or copy and paste into your URL area to see exactly where this building is.

http://www.ccsu.edu/page.cfm?p=4191

Please note this event will take place on the second floor. Look for the Living Room. There will be refreshments and Italian cookies.

 

And by the way, the event is FREE.

 

This a great way to prime up the juices for our Annual Festa di Natale on Dec 3rd.
item.name: Singer & Storyteller & Singer Enzo Boscarino live at CCSU
